home.title: Frontend Developer
home.welcome: Hi, I am João Marcos. A front-end developer based in the Brazil.

about.firstParagraph: I am passionate about creating beautiful interfaces that make the user experience more enjoyable and intuitive. But before I start showing you my work, let me tell you a little bit about myself.
about.secondParagraph: When I am not working on development, I love immersing myself in captivating stories and ideas by reading books. I believe that reading is one of the best ways to broaden our minds and gain a deeper understanding of the world. I also have a passion for digital illustrations and spend countless hours refining my skills and crafting captivating compositions.
about.thirdParagraph: Speaking of programming, coding is one of my great passions. I love the challenge of writing clean and efficient code that solves problems in an elegant and creative way.
about.fourthParagraph: Finally, I hope that this little glimpse into myself can help you understand a little more about what motivates and inspires me.

pinterest.title: Pinterest Clone
pinterest.description: A clone of Pinterest is a web application that replicates the core features and functionalities of the popular image-sharing platform Pinterest using the React framework.

pokedex.title: Pokedex App
pokedex.description: This is an application that lists of the Pokémon released to date, It provides extensive information on each Pokémon, including their name, image, type, abilities, statistics, evolutions, and description.

spotify.title: Spotify Clone
spotify.description: A static web page that replicates the design of the Spotify Web Player.
